explains: n. 商人，交易商；<非正式>毒品贩子
wordGroup: drug dealer 贩毒者；毒品走私犯
authorized dealer 授权经销商；认可交易商
franchised dealer 特许零售商；特约经销商

sentences.en: You are well advised to buy your car through a reputable dealer.
sentences.cn: 你通过一个声誉好的经销商来买车是明智的。

sentences.en: The dealer will provide you with a courtesy car while your vehicle is being repaired.
sentences.cn: 车辆维修期间，经销商会提供免费使用的汽车。

sentences.en: If the system does not work properly, have it checked by your Toyota dealer.
sentences.cn: 如果系统不能正常工作，请您的丰田经销商检查。
